author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Vote for Copenhagen: Best International DestinationTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Vote for Copenhagen: Best International Destination Published on : Wednesday, September 2, 2015
Prevue Visionary Awards – International Destination
Copenhagen is one of five nominees in the category International Destination in the Prevue Visionary Awards 2015. Now it is up to you and the jury of meeting professionals, to decide who wins.
Copenhagen has been nominated by the editors of Prevue magazine, because of: ‘’the city’s environmentally friendly profile: 52% locals bike every day and 71% hotel rooms are eco-certified. Moreover, the Danish meeting design conceptMeetovation, has gotten meeting planners to think more creatively, increate ROI on meeting and incorporate the local environment. The concept is about thinking differently when it comes to meeting, not only thinking about the venues, but also the senses and the set-up. For instance hosting an event at Copenhagen Street Food, which is unique and aligns with the sustainable meetings mission ofMeetovation’’.
Prevue Magazine on Copenhagen:
Copenhagen Street Food Epitomizes VisitDenmark’s Meetovation Mission
On Location: Bella Center & AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen
Copenhagen CVB Shares Millennial Meeting Attendee Insights
VisitDenmark’s Meetovation System is High Touch Meeting Design
